go_data.justification: CMTM6 binds PD-L1 and maintains its cell surface expression.
CMTM6 co-localizes with PD-L1 at the plasma membrane.
CMTM6 co-localizes with PD-L1 in recycling endosomes.

go_data.term: regulation of protein localization to cell surface
go_data.justification: CMTM6 maintains PD-L1 cell surface expression by preventing its lysosome-mediated degradation.
CMTM6 prevents PD-L1 from being targeted for lysosomal degradation.
